hypothesis: Game rules: Knights always tell truth, Knaves always lie, Spies can either
Alice says: Among Violet, Quinn, Tina, and Bob, there is exactly one knight
David says: Among Xavier, Yara, Tina, Alice, Bob, Quinn, and I, there are exactly six knaves
Quinn says: Among Alice and David, exactly one person is lying
Bob says: Alice and I have the same role
Xavier says: Alice, Violet, Yara, Tina, Quinn, and David all have the same role
Violet says: Among Xavier, Tina, and I, the number of knights is even
Yara says: Among Violet, Quinn, Alice, Xavier, and Bob, the number of people who are telling the truth is odd
Tina says: Quinn, Yara, David, and I all have the same role
Hint: Among all players, there is exactly one spy
